p: We believe that the time has come to increase communication aimed at healthcare professionals and medical scientists on the advantages of using medicinal plants as safe, affordable, accessible, and natural alternative healthcare products for the management of health outcomes associated with metabolic disorders. In this review, we explore the role of medicinal plants and their phytochemicals currently being used or investigated in South Africa in treating and preventing the development of MetS risk factors such as obesity, diabetes mellitus, cardiovascular diseases, and non-alcoholic fatty liver disease.
